original_text: And the priest shall put some of the blood upon the horns of the altar of sweet incense before the Lord, which is in the tabernacle of the congregation; and shall pour all the blood of the bullock at the bottom of the altar of the burnt offering, which is at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
korean_text: 제사장은 또 그 피를 여호와 앞 곧 회막 안 향단 뿔들에 바르고 그 송아지의 피 전부를 회막 문 앞 번제단 밑에 쏟을 것이며

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall put some of the blood
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 그 피 얼마를 바를 것이라

sentences.original_text: upon the horns of the altar of sweet incense
which is in the tabernacle of the congregation
and shall pour all the blood of the bullock
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 수송아지의 모든 피를 쏟을 것이라

sentences.original_text: at the bottom of the altar of the burnt offering
which is at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation
